Related repos

  • AI tool for dubbing and translating videos in multiple languages
  • MegaTTS3: speech-to-text aligner and TTS model with voice cloning, supports Chinese and English, runs locally
  • LLM-powered text-to-speech with voice cloning and bilingual support
  • Real-time transcription using Faster-Whisper
  • offline speech-to-text API for many languages, runs on lots of devices and platforms
  • Streaming speech-to-speech language model
  • open-weight text-to-speech model for fast, natural voice synthesis
  • Converts text to speech across languages
  • open source text-to-speech model built by inverting Whisper, supports voice cloning and multilingual output
